description: 日記,つぶやき,雑記帳,Web,国際
html:
これが今年一月、戦禍に晒される前のマリウポリ。

This photo shows Mariupol in January 2022. Within weeks, the invading Russian army would transform this Ukrainian winter wonderland into a city of the dead. Putin’s troops killed tens of thousands of civilians in Mariupol, making it one of the worst war crimes of the 21st century pic.twitter.com/3aeRK9HrPF

— Business Ukraine mag (@Biz_Ukraine_Mag) September 4, 2022
